definitions.title: n.[m.] pl.
definitions.body: twisted threads (NH [[גְּדִיל]], Bab. gidlu, cord on which onions were strung, a string of onions, Zehnpfund:BAS i. 511; Aram. [[גְּדִילָא]], gdiylto0 thread, cord, rope, also plaited locks, gduwle0 id.)—
tassels De 22:12 on border of garment (‖[[חִיחִת]] Nu 15:38, Nu 15:39).
